enemies.name: Sasquatch
enemies.catchphrase: "You have missed a day of school! You are my dinner now!"
enemies.m1: The Sasquatch punches you square in the chest.
enemies.m2: The Sasquatch swipes at you from the side.
enemies.m3: The Sasquatch pelts you with stones.

enemies.name: Vaccuum
enemies.m1: The Vaccuum whacks you with its handle.
enemies.m2: The Vaccuum slams into your legs.
enemies.m3: The Vaccuum trips you with its cord.

enemies.name: Friends Robot
enemies.m1: The Friends Robot hugs you too hard.
enemies.m2: The Friends Robot gives you a too-firm handshake.
enemies.m3: The Friends Robot strokes your head too hard.

enemies.name: Balloony
enemies.catchphrase: "Tableland customer service is mine and mine alone!"
enemies.m2: Balloony forces you to read Tableland propaganda.
enemies.m3: Balloony makes your hair stand on end.

enemies.name: Mr. DesLauriers
enemies.m1: Mr. DesLauriers swings his aluminum baseball bat.
